Title: Subway / Pamela
Plot: Louie starts his evening with a surreal trip on the NYC subway, where he witnesses a busker playing beautiful violin music while a filthy homeless man scrubs himself down with bottled water nearby, has a black-and-white vision of himself saving the riders from a soda-soaked seat, and then heads into the opening credits. ParentalRatingReason: Offensive language, sexual material and other content that may offend
